price: Nuti Gooftaa keenya irraa Guyyaa fuula guuraa hammaataa ta'e sodaanna.”
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
